In England, in the seven days to 18 May, there were 44,680 new confirmed cases (79.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 11 May, there were 54,201 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 18% (9,521 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 23 May is 18,716,214 (33,096.7 cases per 100,000 population).
